# rawutil

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/rmgpanw/rawutil/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/rmgpanw/rawutil/actions)
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/rmgpanw/rawutil/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/rmgpanw/rawutil?branch=main)

This R package contains a collection of miscellaneous utility functions. Please see [package website](https://rmgpanw.github.io/rawutil/) for further information.

## Installation

Install from [GitHub](https://github.com/rmgpanw/rawutil) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("https://github.com/rmgpanw/rawutil")
```
